show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Food Democracy Now
content:
On Today’s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy… (www.healthjournalistblog.
com and @alisonroselevy) will speak with Lisa Stokke, the co-founder and associate director for Food Democracy Now!
www.fooddemocracynow.org @fooddemocracynow They will discuss the California Labeling Initiative to label genetically modified organisms (GMOs) on food products, which if passed will result in the labeling of GMOs in foods all across the US
